metadata.title: CVE-2020-13338 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue has been discovered in GitLab affecting versions prior to12.10.13, 13.0.8, 13.1.2. A stored cross-site scripting vulnerability wasdiscovered when editing references.

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
